name: part_003
file: tmp_【#Myth5years】hololive English -Myth- 5th Anniversary Concert： Fortune Spinner [HT_HUFi8DJ4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: The trio finishes their performance of 'Bibideba' and the stage transitions for Mori Calliope's solo.
Mori Calliope performs her solo song 'Nekkyou'.
Instrumental transition scene featuring floating crystals and candles, leading into the duet performance.
Mori Calliope and Ninomae Ina'nis perform their duet song 'Sepia'.

subtitles.original: Hooray!
subtitles.english: Hooray!

subtitles.original: Let's get started.
subtitles.english: Let's get started.

subtitles.original: Easy breezy down.
subtitles.english: Easy breezy down.

subtitles.original: Hey 頭の中でのこのCremaは 私のPersonaに繋がる
subtitles.english: Hey, the crema in my head connects to my persona

subtitles.original: 生まれたてのアイデアと情熱があるが 疑う事もなく冴えある者が群がる
subtitles.english: With freshly born ideas and passion, those who are sure to shine flock together

subtitles.original: What about you 誰だ？狂妄膨らます
subtitles.english: What about you? Stir up those delusions

subtitles.original: ひと時たまらない分かちきろの先に待つ 結末は麒麟児大器晩成玉だがる
subtitles.english: The end that awaits beyond the fleeting, undeniable moments is the late bloomer’s magnum opus

subtitles.original: 選ぶのは自分景気づけ先に景気飲め
subtitles.english: A segment of one's peak, a cake that comes before a break

subtitles.original: 怒涛に如く数多貸して 研いだ言の葉ここで息高し
subtitles.english: Accompanied by the sweet heights of nostalgia, that's where I'll live

subtitles.original: Come on hurry どこまでも
subtitles.english: Come on hurry, let's go together

subtitles.original: 今夜の事推しあつま
subtitles.english: To the other side of tonight's fleeting dream

subtitles.original: Live it with no hesitation
subtitles.english: Live it with no hesitation

subtitles.original: 時間を忘れ焦がれる炎の情
subtitles.english: Forgetting time, the roar of the fire

subtitles.original: Keep it back coming up next level
subtitles.english: Keep it back coming up next level

subtitles.original: The future's only colored by the cleverest of rebels
subtitles.english: The future's only colored by the cleverest of rebels

subtitles.original: 飽和せし情を糧に正気
subtitles.english: Feeding off of saturated passion, stay sane

subtitles.original: 狂気乱舞種が芽出し入り乱れ賞鼓
subtitles.english: A wild dance of madness, the seed sprouts and the prize is heralded

subtitles.original: 乱れ咲い等謳歌ビルホー
subtitles.english: Enjoy the blooming, chaotic days to the fullest

subtitles.original: 熱狂！
subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: Just a little madness, you could take the drive out of me
subtitles.english: Just a little madness, you could take the drive out of me

subtitles.original: 熱狂！
subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: Can't hide it's a new generation creation
subtitles.english: Can't hide it's a new generation creation

subtitles.original: 熱狂！
subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: Tearing up the canvas, won't be watching what you want me to be
subtitles.english: Tearing up the canvas, won't be watching what you want me to be

subtitles.original: 熱狂！
subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: Can't fight this uprising outbreak of passion
subtitles.english: Can't fight this uprising outbreak of passion

subtitles.original: Too rough, too loud, unburned, unrefined
subtitles.english: Too rough, too loud, unburned, unrefined

subtitles.original: Find out that flood of noise is only in our minds
subtitles.english: Find out that flood of noise is only in our minds

subtitles.original: Right now, it's time, no doubt we're moving on
subtitles.english: Right now, it's time, no doubt we're moving on

subtitles.original: I'm drawing my ideal world at each and every dawn
subtitles.english: I'm drawing my ideal world at each and every dawn

subtitles.original: 狂い出した瞬間
subtitles.english: The moment things went crazy

subtitles.original: 感じきれば悩みも昇華
subtitles.english: If you notice, your worries will be sublimated

subtitles.original: Breaking all expectations, time to forget and burn with the passion
subtitles.english: Breaking all expectations, time to forget and burn with the passion

subtitles.original: 反芻するならし
subtitles.english: No need for rumination

subtitles.original: 罪過の眼差し
subtitles.english: The gaze of guilt

subtitles.original: 解き放とう情熱を今
subtitles.english: Release the passion right now

subtitles.original: Never hitting the brakes to prove I got what it takes
subtitles.english: Never hitting the brakes to prove I got what it takes

subtitles.original: To manifest a world you've never discerned as real or fake, so come on
subtitles.english: To manifest a world you've never discerned as real or fake, so come on

subtitles.original: 熱狂！
subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: Just a little madness, you could take the drive out of me
subtitles.english: Just a little madness, you could take the drive out of me

subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: Tearing up the canvas, won't be watching what you want me to be
subtitles.english: Tearing up the canvas, won't be watching what you want me to be

subtitles.original: 熱狂！
subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: Can't fight this uprising outbreak of passion
subtitles.english: Can't fight this uprising outbreak of passion

subtitles.original: ああ 人様よこれっぽっちも
subtitles.english: Ah, people don't even have a bit of it

subtitles.original: 自分の背中預けるような夢があればそれでいい
subtitles.english: As long as you have a dream that you can entrust your back to, it's fine

subtitles.original: 誰れに笑われようよりもひたすらにあがき
subtitles.english: Keep struggling no matter who laughs at you

subtitles.original: やまない雨はないと信じ今に様変わる
subtitles.english: Believing that there's no rain that won't stop, everything will change now

subtitles.original: Words are gifted, prolific, you bet to be specific
subtitles.english: Words are gifted, prolific, you bet to be specific

subtitles.original: Brushstrokes blowing smoke blink and you can miss it
subtitles.english: Brushstrokes blowing smoke blink and you can miss it

subtitles.original: These words elicit visions of a future so exquisite
subtitles.english: These words elicit visions of a future so exquisite

subtitles.original: Some masterpiece you never seen wait a few commit it
subtitles.english: Some masterpiece you never seen wait a few commit it

subtitles.original: 知らない事があれば研究 出来ない事があれば練習
subtitles.english: If there's something you don't know, research it. If there's something you can't do, practice it.

subtitles.original: 姿勢を前のめり 我を熱中
subtitles.english: Lean forward and get absorbed in yourself

subtitles.original: 成功の真反対にある失敗が 一番の近道だ You can do it 最高峰は道だ
subtitles.english: The failures on the opposite side of success are the shortest path. You can do it, the peak is the path.

subtitles.original: Stars align and all design I'm already on my way
subtitles.english: Stars align and all design I'm already on my way

subtitles.original: ほとばしる情熱 瑞々が震える鼓動の銃弾まで
subtitles.english: Gushing passion, until the moist pulse of the bullets

subtitles.original: Focus finding all this blind risk I'm already on my way
subtitles.english: Focus finding all this blind risk I'm already on my way

subtitles.original: This is some vivid and striking my NEKKYOU!
subtitles.english: This is some vivid and striking my NEKKYOU!

subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: This is some vivid and striking my NEKKYOU!
subtitles.english: This is some vivid and striking my NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: 熱狂！
subtitles.english: NEKKYOU!

subtitles.original: 誤解すんなよ こんな滑稽な
subtitles.english: Don't misunderstand, it's laughable

subtitles.original: サッと過ぎ去る毎日（エブリデイ）
subtitles.english: How time flashes by every day

subtitles.original: Another prisoner of fate no one could fake out
subtitles.english: Another prisoner of fate no one could fake out

subtitles.original: Stay awake now, you know you wanna fire away
subtitles.english: Stay awake now, you know you wanna fire away

subtitles.original: Now there's no question where the fault lies
subtitles.english: Now there's no question where the fault lies

subtitles.original: These days I struggle just to empathize
subtitles.english: These days I struggle just to empathize

subtitles.original: もう戻らないって分かっているんだろう
subtitles.english: There's no going back, and you know that

subtitles.original: Cast a blessing on my cursed role
subtitles.english: Cast a blessing on my cursed role

subtitles.original: And feed this bleeding egotistical soul
subtitles.english: And feed this bleeding egotistical soul

subtitles.original: Before you know it, it's the moment you've lost all control
subtitles.english: Before you know it, it's the moment you've lost all control

subtitles.original: 遠き日の夢を見るたび
subtitles.english: Every time I dream of days gone by

subtitles.original: 生まれた意味を考えてしまうの
subtitles.english: I wonder why I came to be

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 美しい 青い日々だな
subtitles.english: Ah, such beautiful, youthful days

subtitles.original: この目に焼き付けておこうかな
subtitles.english: I should burn their images into my mind

subtitles.original: もう少し強くならないとな
subtitles.english: But I'd have to be a little stronger first

subtitles.original: 身分不相応の嫉妬に塗れた
subtitles.english: Dripping in jealousy that's a bit too daring

subtitles.original: ちょっと足りないエクスタシー
subtitles.english: An ecstasy that's just a little bit lacking

subtitles.original: 誤解も解けないまま私 人を傷つけて
subtitles.english: I hurt somebody without ever opening my eyes

subtitles.original: 一粒の才すらないわ
subtitles.english: But there's no talent here, it's clear to see

subtitles.original: 転がり落ちたジロゴロサイ
subtitles.english: The rigged dice falls and rolls

subtitles.original: 貴方の愛に気付けないまま
subtitles.english: Before I ever notice your love and affection

subtitles.original: Cast a blessing on my cursed heart
subtitles.english: Cast a blessing on my cursed heart

subtitles.original: Why keep me breathing while it's falling apart?
subtitles.english: Why keep me breathing while it's falling apart?

subtitles.original: どうか神様 教えてくれますか
subtitles.english: Pray tell me, God
